title: Bread pudding (Zemlovka)
description: This is a kind of bread and butter pud with an Eve’s pudding vibe from the fruit, and we like it made with brioche instead of ordinary bread.  Warm and comforting, it’s just right on a cold night.
ingredients: 3 apples or 3 pears or a mixture of both
125g/4½ oz unsalted butter, plus extra for greasing
½ large bread loaf, can be a bit stale (or brioche)
